Reviews.Title: No drama, reasonable price ~~
Reviews.Author: Marlene Rusk
Reviews.Content: Drama free transaction:  I bought it, I paid for it, they delivered it.  It's charging right now - the charge cord is not for NA outlets, but this seller threw in an adapter - nice touch.  It looks a lot like an old telus keybo what I loved until I replaced it with a iPhone -- my first foray into unlocked phones and SIM cards so I won't know if it will suit my needs until I get to Costa Rica in a couple weeks.  If it doesn't - my own d*mn fault.

ProductInfo.Features:
Operating Frequencies:  GSM Quad Band - 850/900/1800/1900 MHz; Supported 3G Modes: MHz HSPA 850/1900 MHz
2.8" touchscreen,   MP3 player with microSD slot (supports up to 16GB), WiFi Hotspot
Compatible Networks: Unlocked to work on any GSM network anywhere in the world.  Canada - Rogers / FIDO / Bell / Telus / Koodo / Virgin / City / Sasktel; USA - AT&T;, T-Mobile (2G only) ; Africa / Europe / Asia (2G only)- all GSM carriers
Incompatible Networks: Canada: Wind / Mobilicity / Videoron   USA: Verizon / T-mobile 3G (check with carrier) / All CDMA carriers.
SIMCARD Type: Standard mini-simcard, full size (most widely use kind), LG Proprietory Operating System, 3G Data Capable, Bluetooth Enabled, Global Ready, Internet Browser, Music Player, Touch Screen, Speakerphone
ProductInfo.Name: LG Breeze GW525G - New Unlocked - GSM 3G 2.8 inch slide-Out QWERTY Phone
